- Pure 100% SSD RAID-10 on Adaptec controllers

- Xen virtualization, resources are guaranteed
- Tier III+ Data-center - Global Switch, Frankfurt-am-Main
- The full control on your VPS from billing panel
- 4 CPU Cores for each VPS

Price:
